channel.title: SMF 78 Subtype 3 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 78 Subtype 3 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - alias_management_aval
item.description: X'80’ Alias Management Groups available Map: R783GD Based on: r783gflx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r783gflx.

item.title: Field - arch_mode
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF78PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - asl
item.description: LENGTH OF DATA SECTION Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78ASL

item.title: Field - asn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA SECTIONS Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78ASN

item.title: Field - ass
item.description: Offset to data section R781DS (subtype 1) R782PVT (subtype 2) R783DS (subtype 3) Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78ASS

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF78S3 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - ch_path_data_invalid
item.description: X'04’ Measured channel path data invalid Map: R783CPD Based on: r783cpst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r783cpst.

item.title: Field - ch_path_dcm
item.description: X'02’ Channel path is DCM managed Map: R783CPD Based on: r783cpst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r783cpst.

item.title: Field - ch_path_installed
item.description: X'80’ Channel path installed Map: R783CPD Based on: r783cpst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r783cpst.

item.title: Field - ch_path_offline
item.description: X'10’ This channel path is offline to all devices to the LCU Map: R783CPD Based on: r783cpst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r783cpst.

item.title: Field - ch_path_online
item.description: X'40’ Channel path online Map: R783CPD Based on: r783cpst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r783cpst.

item.title: Field - ch_path_varied
item.description: X'20’ Channel path varied Map: R783CPD Based on: r783cpst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r783cpst.

item.title: Field - chpid_manipulated
item.description: X'01’ CHPID manipulated, requiring data reset Map: R783CPD Based on: r783cpst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r783cpst.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - command_response_time_supported
item.description: Initial-command-response- time measurements supported Map: R783GD Based on: r783gflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r783gflg.

item.title: Field - config_change_attempt
item.description: X'10’ Conf. Map: R783DS Based on: r783dst Description Chg. Attempt Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r783dst.

item.title: Field - config_changed
item.description: Configuration changed last interval Map: R783GD Based on: r783cfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r783cfl.

item.title: Field - config_changed_last_ipl
item.description: Configuration Changed since last IPL Map: R783GD Based on: r783cfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r783cfl.

item.title: Field - connect_time_invalid
item.description: X'40’ connect time of at least one device invalid Map: R783DS Based on: r783dstx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r783dstx.

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length 000TTTTF Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78CYC

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start: 00YYDDDF Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78DAT

item.title: Field - dat_facility1
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF78PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dat_facility2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF78PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - data_invalid_ch_failure
item.description: X'80’ Data is invalid due to failure of the channel measurement facility Map: R783GD Based on: r783gflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r783gflg.

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78DTE

item.title: Field - dcl
item.description: LENGTH OF SECTION Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78DCL

item.title: Field - dcm_hw_supported
item.description: X'10’ DCM supported by hardware Map: R783GD Based on: r783gflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r783gflg.

item.title: Field - dcm_managed_ch
item.description: X'08’ Configuration contains DCM managed channels Map: R783GD Based on: r783gflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r783gflg.

item.title: Field - dcn
item.description: NUMBER OF SECTIONS Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78DCN

item.title: Field - dcs
item.description: Offset to configuration section R781CS (subtype 1), data section R782COMN (subtype 2) or configuration section R783CS (subtype 3) Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78DCS

item.title: Field - diagnose_failed
item.description: X'40’ DIAGNOSE interface failed Map: R783GD Based on: r783gflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r783gflg.

item.title: Field - disconnect_time_invalid
item.description: X'20’ disconnect time of at least one device invalid Map: R783DS Based on: r783dstx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r783dstx.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78DTE

item.title: Field - dynamically_added
item.description: X'20’ Dynamically added Map: R783DS Based on: r783dst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r783dst.

item.title: Field - dynamically_changed
item.description: X'40’ Dynamically changed Map: R783DS Based on: r783dst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r783dst.

item.title: Field - eadm_compression_aval
item.description: X'40’ EADM-compression facility available Map: R783GD Based on: r783gflx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r783gflx.

item.title: Field - entries_iop_queue
item.description: Sum of number of entries placed on the IOP initiative queue Map: R783IQD Based on: R783IQSM

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF78S3 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - escon_ch
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF78PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - escon_dir
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF78PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - expanded_stor
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF78PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - extended_io_mesurment1
item.description: 1= extended I/O- measurement-block format-1 data available Map: R783CPD Based on: r783cpxf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r783cpxf.

item.title: Field - extended_io_mesurment2
item.description: 1= extended I/O- measurement-block format-2 data available Map: R783CPD Based on: r783cpxf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r783cpxf.

item.title: Field - first_transfer_ready_disabled
item.description: 1= First-transfer-ready- disabled supported Map: R783CPD Based on: r783cpxf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r783cpxf.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78FLA Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 invalid_samples 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III interval_smf_control 3 Interval was under SMF control lower_service_level 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. higher_service_level 5 SMF record converted to higher release or service level.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time (STCK format) Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78GIE

item.title: Field - higher_service_level
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - hpl
item.description: Length of HyperPAV/ SuperPAV Data Section Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78HPL

item.title: Field - hpn
item.description: Number of HyperPAV/ SuperPAV Data Sections Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78HPN

item.title: Field - hps
item.description: Offset to HyperPAV/ SuperPAV Data Sections Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78HPS

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78IET

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78IML Description X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval: MMSSTTTF Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78INT

item.title: Field - interval_smf_control
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - invalid_samples
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - io_config_token_valid
item.description: I/O Configuration Token is valid Map: R783GD Based on: r783cfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r783cfl.

item.title: Field - iop_installed
item.description: = 1, if IOP is installed Map: R783IQD Based on: r783iflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r783iflg.

item.title: Field - iop_util_data_supported
item.description: X'04’ IOP utilization data supported Map: R783GD Based on: r783gflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r783gflg.

item.title: Field - ipl_iodf
item.description: System IPLed via IODF Map: R783GD Based on: r783cfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r783cfl.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: TOD monitor interval start: 0HHMMSSF Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78IST

item.title: Field - lcu_has_dcm_ch
item.description: X'08’ LCU contains DCM managed channels Map: R783DS Based on: r783dst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r783dst.

item.title: Field - lcu_has_ficom
item.description: X'80’ LCU contains at least one FICON channel Map: R783DS Based on: r783dstx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r783dstx.

item.title: Field - lcu_has_hyperpav
item.description: X'02’ LCU has HyperPAV devices Map: R783DS Based on: r783dst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r783dst.

item.title: Field - lcu_has_superpav
item.description: X'01’ LCU has SuperPAV devices Map: R783DS Based on: r783dst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r783dst.

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78LEN Description ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78LGO

item.title: Field - lower_service_level
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number in packed decimal format: nnnF Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78MFV

item.title: Field - multi_ch_subsys_allowed
item.description: Hardware allows multiple channel subsystems Map: R783GD Based on: r783cfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r783cfl.

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78MVS

item.title: Field - no_hw_measurement
item.description: X'80’ No hardware measurements Map: R783DS Based on: r783dst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r783dst.

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78OIL

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF78S3 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - path_attr_valid
item.description: X'04’ Path attributes are valid Map: R783DS Based on: r783dst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r783dst.

item.title: Field - path_attributes
item.description: Path attributes: 0 = No attributes specified, 1 = Preferred path, 2 = Non-preferred path Map: R783CPD Based on: R783CPAT Post-Processed The source values (SMF) are mapped in IBM SMF Explorer as follows: Source value IBM SMF Explorer meaning 0 no_attributes 1 preferred_path 2 no_preferred_path

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78PRD

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78PRF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description expanded_stor 0 System has expanded storage escon_ch 1 Equipped with ESCON channel escon_dir 2 ESCON Director in configuration arch_mode 3 System in z/ARCH mode zapp_inst 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed ziip_inst 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed dat_facility1 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 dat_facility2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78PRL

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78PRN

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78PRS

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78PTN

item.title: Field - qdl
item.description: Length of IOQ global section Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78QDL

item.title: Field - qdn
item.description: Number of IOQ global section Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78QDN

item.title: Field - qds
item.description: Offset to IOQ global section Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78QDS

item.title: Field - r783amgc
item.description: The Alias Management Group number defined on the physical controller for this LCU. Map: R783CS Based on: R783AMGC Description This number is valid, if the LCU is assigned to a DASD subsystem that supports Alias Management Groups and bit 7 of R783DST is set

item.title: Field - r783amgs
item.description: The Alias Management Group number assigned by z/OS for this LCU on this system. Map: R783CS Based on: R783AMGS Description This number is valid, if the LCU is assigned to a DASD subsystem that supports Alias Management Groups and bit 7 of R783DST is set

item.title: Field - r783cbt
item.description: Control Unit busy delay time in units of 128 microseconds valid if R783CPXM=1 Map: R783CPD Based on: R783CBT

item.title: Field - r783cbtm
item.description: Accumulated Control unit Busy delay Time for DCM Managed channels valid if R783CPXM=1 Map: R783DS Based on: R783CBTM

item.title: Field - r783cfl
item.description: Configuration Change Flags Map: R783GD Based on: R783CFL Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description config_changed 0 Configuration changed last interval config_changed_last_ipl 1 Configuration Changed since last IPL ipl_iodf 2 System IPLed via IODF io_config_token_valid 3 I/O Configuration Token is valid multi_ch_subsys_allowed 4 Hardware allows multiple channel subsystems

item.title: Field - r783cmr
item.description: Initial Command Response time in units of 128 microseconds valid if R783CPXM=1 and R783GCMR=1 Map: R783CPD Based on: R783CMR

item.title: Field - r783cmrm
item.description: Accumulated initial Command Response time for DCM Managed channels valid if R783CPXM=1 and R783GCMR=1 Map: R783DS Based on: R783CMRM

item.title: Field - r783cpdl
item.description: Length of configuration data section Map: R783CS Based on: R783CPDL

item.title: Field - r783cpdn
item.description: Number of configuration data sections Map: R783CS Based on: R783CPDN

item.title: Field - r783cpds
item.description: Offset to configuration data section Map: R783CS Based on: R783CPDS

item.title: Field - r783cpid
item.description: Channel path identifier Map: R783CPD Based on: R783CPID

item.title: Field - r783cpst
item.description: Channel path status Map: R783CPD Based on: R783CPST Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description ch_path_installed 0 X'80’ Channel path installed ch_path_online 1 X'40’ Channel path online ch_path_varied 2 X'20’ Channel path varied ch_path_offline 3 X'10’ This channel path is offline to all devices to the LCU vary_path_action 4 X'08’ The connectivity of this channel path to devices of this LCU has manipulated via VARY PATH during this measurement interval ch_path_data_invalid 5 X'04’ Measured channel path data invalid ch_path_dcm 6 X'02’ Channel path is DCM managed chpid_manipulated 7 X'01’ CHPID manipulated, requiring data reset

item.title: Field - r783cpxf
item.description: Channel Path extended flags Map: R783CPD Based on: R783CPXF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description extended_io_mesurment1 0 1= extended I/O- measurement-block format-1 data available extended_io_mesurment2 1 1= extended I/O- measurement-block format-2 data available first_transfer_ready_disabled 2 1= First-transfer-ready- disabled supported

item.title: Field - r783css
item.description: Channel SubSystem Id, only valid if R783MCS = ON Map: R783GD Based on: R783CSS

item.title: Field - r783csst
item.description: Channel Subsystem Wait Time in units of 128 microseconds valid if R783CPXM=1 Map: R783DS Based on: R783CSST

item.title: Field - r783ctmw
item.description: Transport mode write count valid if R783CPTD=1 Map: R783CPD Based on: R783CTMW

item.title: Field - r783ctrd
item.description: First-transfer-ready- disabled write count valid if R783CPTD=1 Map: R783CPD Based on: R783CTRD

item.title: Field - r783cu1
item.description: 1st ctrl unit identifier Map: R783CPD Based on: R783CU1

item.title: Field - r783cu2
item.description: 2nd ctrl unit identifier Map: R783CPD Based on: R783CU2

item.title: Field - r783cu3
item.description: 3rd ctrl unit identifier Map: R783CPD Based on: R783CU3

item.title: Field - r783cu4
item.description: 4th ctrl unit identifier Map: R783CPD Based on: R783CU4

item.title: Field - r783cub
item.description: Count of control unit busy Map: R783CPD Based on: R783CUB

item.title: Field - r783cubm
item.description: Accumulated control unit busy count for DCM managed channels Map: R783DS Based on: R783CUBM

item.title: Field - r783cun
item.description: Number of control units attached Map: R783CPD Based on: R783CUN

item.title: Field - r783dctm
item.description: Accumulated device connect time for this LCU in units of 128 microseconds Map: R783DS Based on: R783DCTM

item.title: Field - r783ddtm
item.description: Accumulated device disconnect time for this LCU in units of 128 microseconds Map: R783DS Based on: R783DDTM

item.title: Field - r783dpb
item.description: ESCON Director port busy count Map: R783CPD Based on: R783DPB

item.title: Field - r783dpbm
item.description: Accumulated director port busy count for DCM managed channels Map: R783DS Based on: R783DPBM

item.title: Field - r783dst
item.description: Data status Map: R783DS Based on: R783DST Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description no_hw_measurement 0 X'80’ No hardware measurements dynamically_changed 1 X'40’ Dynamically changed dynamically_added 2 X'20’ Dynamically added config_change_attempt 3 X'10’ Conf. lcu_has_dcm_ch 4 X'08’ LCU contains DCM managed channels path_attr_valid 5 X'04’ Path attributes are valid lcu_has_hyperpav 6 X'02’ LCU has HyperPAV devices lcu_has_superpav 7 X'01’ LCU has SuperPAV devices

item.title: Field - r783dstx
item.description: Data status extension Map: R783DS Based on: R783DSTX Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description lcu_has_ficom 0 X'80’ LCU contains at least one FICON channel connect_time_invalid 1 X'40’ connect time of at least one device invalid disconnect_time_invalid 2 X'20’ disconnect time of at least one device invalid

item.title: Field - r783gflg
item.description: IOQ global flag Map: R783GD Based on: R783GFLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description data_invalid_ch_failure 0 X'80’ Data is invalid due to failure of the channel measurement facility diagnose_failed 1 X'40’ DIAGNOSE interface failed store_primary_not_supported 2 X'20’ Store Primary Queue Data not supported dcm_hw_supported 3 X'10’ DCM supported by hardware dcm_managed_ch 4 X'08’ Configuration contains DCM managed channels iop_util_data_supported 5 X'04’ IOP utilization data supported command_response_time_supported 6 Initial-command-response- time measurements supported transfer_ready_disabled_aval 7 First-transfer-ready- disabled write data available

item.title: Field - r783gflx
item.description: IOQ global flags extended Map: R783GD Based on: R783GFLX Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description alias_management_aval 0 X'80’ Alias Management Groups available eadm_compression_aval 1 X'40’ EADM-compression facility available scm_aval 2 X'20’ SCM facility available

item.title: Field - r783gidl
item.description: Length of IOP initiative queue data section Map: R783GD Based on: R783GIDL

item.title: Field - r783gidn
item.description: Number of IOP initiative queue data sections Map: R783GD Based on: R783GIDN

item.title: Field - r783gids
item.description: Offset to IOP initiative queue data section Map: R783GD Based on: R783GIDS

item.title: Field - r783gntr
item.description: Number of triplets Map: R783GD Based on: R783GNTR

item.title: Field - r783haiu
item.description: The high water mark of the number of in-use HyperPAV-alias devices for the LSS (does not include borrowed alias devices) Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783HAIU

item.title: Field - r783hcad
item.description: The high water mark of the number of aliases concurrently in-use by one of the HyperPAV-base devices of the LSS (does include loaned alias devices) Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783HCAD

item.title: Field - r783hcnt
item.description: Number of HyperPAV sections for that LCU Map: R783DS Based on: R783HCNT

item.title: Field - r783hcu
item.description: HyperPAV control unit identifier Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783HCU

item.title: Field - r783hioq
item.description: The high water mark of I/Os queued Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783HIOQ

item.title: Field - r783hix
item.description: Index to first HyperPAV section of that LCU Map: R783DS Based on: R783HIX

item.title: Field - r783hlcu
item.description: HyperPAV Logical control unit identifier Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783HLCU

item.title: Field - r783hnai
item.description: The number of times an I/O could not start for an LSS because no HyperPAV-aliases were available and the device was not waiting for a reserve to be released from another system or long busy to subside (short floating point) Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783HNAI

item.title: Field - r783htio
item.description: The total number of HyperPAV I/O requests for the LSS (short floating point) Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783HTIO

item.title: Field - r783icpb
item.description: Number of times an I/O was retried due to channel path busy, (long floating point) Map: R783IQD Based on: R783ICPB

item.title: Field - r783icub
item.description: Number of times an I/O was retried due to control unit busy, (long floating point) Map: R783IQD Based on: R783ICUB

item.title: Field - r783id1
item.description: logical control unit identifier Map: R783CS Based on: R783ID1

item.title: Field - r783id2
item.description: Logical control unit identifier Map: R783DS Based on: R783ID2

item.title: Field - r783idpb
item.description: Number of times an I/O was retried due to director port busy, (long floating point) Map: R783IQD Based on: R783IDPB

item.title: Field - r783idvb
item.description: Number of times an I/O was retried due to device busy, (long floating point) Map: R783IQD Based on: R783IDVB

item.title: Field - r783iecb
item.description: Number of times the I/O processor was busy with compression or decompression (long floating point) Map: R783IQD Based on: R783IECB

item.title: Field - r783iflg
item.description: IOP flags Map: R783IQD Based on: R783IFLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description iop_installed 0 = 1, if IOP is installed

item.title: Field - r783iifs
item.description: Number of I/O functions initially started, (long floating point) Map: R783IQD Based on: R783IIFS

item.title: Field - r783iipb
item.description: Number of times the I/O processor was busy, (long floating point) Map: R783IQD Based on: R783IIPB

item.title: Field - r783iipi
item.description: Number of times the I/O processor was idle, (long floating point) Map: R783IQD Based on: R783IIPI

item.title: Field - r783ipii
item.description: Number of processed I/O interrupts, (long floating point) Map: R783IQD Based on: R783IPII

item.title: Field - r783iqct
item.description: Count of number of entries placed on the IOP initiative queue Map: R783IQD Based on: R783IQCT

item.title: Field - r783iqid
item.description: IOP initiative queue identifier Map: R783IQD Based on: R783IQID

item.title: Field - r783iscb
item.description: Number of times the I/O processor was busy with SCM operations (long floating point) Map: R783IQD Based on: R783ISCB

item.title: Field - r783mcdf
item.description: Defined number of DCM managed channels Map: R783DS Based on: R783MCDF

item.title: Field - r783mcmn
item.description: Minimum number of DCM managed channels used Map: R783DS Based on: R783MCMN

item.title: Field - r783mcmx
item.description: Maximum number of DCM managed channels used Map: R783DS Based on: R783MCMX

item.title: Field - r783ntr
item.description: Number of despriptor triplets Map: R783CS Based on: R783NTR

item.title: Field - r783nxt
item.description: Number of data sections in following records Map: R783GD Based on: R783NXT

item.title: Field - r783pt
item.description: Count of channel path taken Map: R783CPD Based on: R783PT

item.title: Field - r783ptm
item.description: Accumulated path taken count for DCM managed channels Map: R783DS Based on: R783PTM

item.title: Field - r783qct
item.description: Q’d COUNT on CU-HDR queue Map: R783DS Based on: R783QCT

item.title: Field - r783qsm
item.description: Q’d SUM on CU-HDR queue Map: R783DS Based on: R783QSM

item.title: Field - r783sbs
item.description: Switch Busy count Summation contains the switch busy counts received for all partitions valid if R783CPXM=1 Map: R783CPD Based on: R783SBS

item.title: Field - r783sbsm
item.description: Accumulated Switch Busy count summation for DCM Managed channels valid if R783CPXM=1 Map: R783DS Based on: R783SBSM

item.title: Field - r783tdt
item.description: IODF Creation Date mm/dd/yy Map: R783GD Based on: R783TDT

item.title: Field - r783tdy
item.description: IODF creation date mm/dd/yyyy Map: R783GD Based on: R783TDY

item.title: Field - r783tmwm
item.description: Accumulated transport mode write count for DCM managed channels valid if R783CPTD=1 Map: R783DS Based on: R783TMWM

item.title: Field - r783tnm
item.description: IODF name Map: R783GD Based on: R783TNM

item.title: Field - r783tot
item.description: Total number of data sections in large SMF record Map: R783GD Based on: R783TOT

item.title: Field - r783trdm
item.description: Accumulated first-transfer- ready-disabled write count for DCM managed channels valid if R783CPTD=1 Map: R783DS Based on: R783TRDM

item.title: Field - r783tsf
item.description: Suffix of IODF Name Map: R783GD Based on: R783TSF

item.title: Field - r783tsr
item.description: Total number of small records Map: R783GD Based on: R783TSR

item.title: Field - r783ttm
item.description: IODF Creation Time hh.mm.ss Map: R783GD Based on: R783TTM

item.title: Field - r783xabc
item.description: The number of times an alias was borrowed from a peer LCU (short floating point) Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783XABC

item.title: Field - r783xalc
item.description: The number of times an alias was loaned to a peer LCU (short floating point) Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783XALC

item.title: Field - r783xanc
item.description: The number of times an alias was needed to start an I/O (short floating point) Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783XANC

item.title: Field - r783xauc
item.description: The number of times an alias was needed to start an I/O and one was used (short floating point) Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783XAUC

item.title: Field - r783xcbc
item.description: The number of aliases concurrently borrowed from peer LCUs Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783XCBC

item.title: Field - r783xciu
item.description: The cumulative number of aliases defined to this subsystem that were in use when aliases were needed (short floating point) Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783XCIU

item.title: Field - r783xclc
item.description: The number of aliases concurrently loaned to peer LCUs Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783XCLC

item.title: Field - r783xcqd
item.description: The cumulative number of I/Os queued at the subsystem level when aliases were needed (short floating point) Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783XCQD

item.title: Field - r783xhbc
item.description: The high water mark of concurrently borrowed aliases from peer LCUs Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783XHBC

item.title: Field - r783xhlc
item.description: The high water mark of concurrently loaned aliases to peer LCUs Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783XHLC

item.title: Field - r783xnag
item.description: The number of attempts that were made to borrow an alias from peer LCUs but none were available (short floating point) Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783XNAG

item.title: Field - r783xnhc
item.description: The number of times an alias was needed to start an I/O, but none was available in the home LCU (short floating point) Map: R783HPAV Based on: R783XNHC

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78RAL Description Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78RAN Description This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78RAO

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF78S3 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78RTY

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78SAM

item.title: Field - scm_aval
item.description: X'20’ SCM facility available Map: R783GD Based on: r783gflx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r783gflx.

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78SEG

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78SID

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78SNM

item.title: Field - speed_boost
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78SRL

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78SSI

item.title: Field - store_primary_not_supported
item.description: X'20’ Store Primary Queue Data not supported Map: R783GD Based on: r783gflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r783gflg.

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78STY

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF78S3 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78SYN

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF78S3 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TOD RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78TME

item.title: Field - transfer_ready_disabled_aval
item.description: First-transfer-ready- disabled write data available Map: R783GD Based on: r783gflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r783gflg.

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF78S3 Based on: SMF78TRN

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF78S3 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vary_path_action
item.description: X'08’ The connectivity of this channel path to devices of this LCU has manipulated via VARY PATH during this measurement interval Map: R783CPD Based on: r783cpst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r783cpst.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF78S3 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78XNM

item.title: Field - zapp_inst
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF78PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ziip_boost
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ziip_inst
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF78PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.
